p: In addition to revising and improving economic performance measures pertaining to environmental sustainability, incentives for environmental stewardship need to be strengthened. This is particularly important in the food and land use systems sectors. Reducing emissions from deforestation and degradation (REDD+) and other schemes related to payment for ecosystem services (PES) have a mixed track record. Building on lessons learned, such mechanisms should be reformed and strengthened to reward those farmers and other stakeholders who act as stewards of the environment and promote a wider adoption of sustainable land management practices.
